WinFileSystem Class Reference

This class provides an implementation of IFileSystem that reads from a Windows filesystem. More...

Detailed Description

This class provides an implementation of IFileSystem that reads from a Windows filesystem.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

WinFileSystem::WinFileSystem ( const std::string &  basePath  ) 

This is the constructor.

Parameters:
basePath Base path of the filesystem, including trailing '/'

WinFileSystem::~WinFileSystem (  ) 

This is the destructor.

Member Function Documentation

void WinFileSystem::checkCaseOfPaths ( bool  enable  )  [virtual]

This enables or disables a filename case check.

Parameters:
enable If true then files are checked for correct case in the filename, and if false then files are not checked.

Reimplemented from IFileSystem.

FileSystemPtr WinFileSystem::clone (  )  [virtual]

This method returns a IFileSystem pointer to a copy of this object.

Returns:
a copy of this object

Implements IFileSystem.

std::string WinFileSystem::correctCaseOfPath ( const std::string &  path  )  const [virtual]

This corrects the case of the given path by getting the path that the operating system has on disk.

Parameters:
path The path to get the correct case of.
Returns:
The path corrected for case to match what is stored on disk. If the path does not exist then it is returned.

Reimplemented from IFileSystem.

bool WinFileSystem::eraseFileOrDirectory ( const std::string &  path  )  [virtual]

This method erases the file or directory specified by path.

Directories need not be empty.

Returns true on success

Implements IFileSystem.

std::string WinFileSystem::eventTimeToString ( uint64  eventTime  )  [virtual]

This method converts the given file event time to a string.

The string is in the same format as would be stored in a CVS/Entries file.

Implements IFileSystem.

IFileSystem::FileType WinFileSystem::getAbsoluteFileType ( const std::string &  path,
FileInfo *  pFI = NULL 
) [static]

This method returns the file type of a given path within the file system.

Parameters:
path Absolute path to the file.
pFI If not NULL, this is set to the type of this file.
Returns:
The type of file

std::string WinFileSystem::getAbsolutePath ( const std::string &  path  )  const [virtual]

This method resolves the base dependent path to a fully qualified path.

Parameters:
path Path relative to the base of the filesystem.
checkExists When true, returns the path if the file or directory exists and returns an empty string if it doesn't. When false, returns the fully qualified path even if the file or directory doesn't exist.
Returns:
The fully qualified path or empty string. See checkExists.

Implements IFileSystem.

) const [virtual]

IFileSystem::FileType WinFileSystem::getFileTypeEx ( const std::string &  path,
FileInfo *  pFI 
) [virtual]

This method returns the file type of a given path within the file system.

This extended version checks if the file is an archive.

Parameters:
path Path relative to the base of the filesystem.
pFI If not NULL, this is set to the type of this file.
Returns:
The type of file

bool WinFileSystem::moveFileOrDirectory ( const std::string &  oldPath,
const std::string &  newPath 
) [virtual]

This method renames the file or directory specified by oldPath to be specified by newPath.

oldPath and newPath need not be in common.

Returns true on success

Implements IFileSystem.

BinaryPtr  pData,
bool  binary 
) [virtual]

This method writes a file to disk.
